sense.def: Alternative Names xiao er nai pi 小兒奶癖. Pathological Condition of children who fail to digest breast-milk and as a result develop lumps in their abdomen or flanks while assuming a yellow complexion and losing weight. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 88: 小兒乳癖結實，或有滯惡，停積不散，令兒日漸羸瘦，面色萎 黃 , “ Children’s breast-milk aggregation-illness with nodular repletion, sometimes with stagnant malign [qi] that halts and accumulates without dispersing and causes children to gradually lose weight every day, with their faces assuming a wilting yellow complexion”.
